name: Rope&Digger
description:
Okay ... In this game, the miner needs to get rich and collect as much wealth as possible in his pocket.

 Be careful, because the path is not easy and you can get in the way of spikes, platforms and bats. And the rope can break at any moment! I hope you can survive and raise a lot of money for yourself and your family. 

Well... I will not distract, go on a journey!
